overview: Welcome to 'Captain Butts' Beach', a big-budget 35mm feature film directed by the sensational Duck Dumont, who has assembled the hottest stars and the best butts ever seen. Stars Ashlyn Gere, Melanie Moore, Lacy Rose, Mona Lisa, Jamie Gillis, Randy Spears, Peter North and Marc Wallice find themselves back in the 17th Century on pirate's beach. 'Captain Butt's Beach' will have you saying 'Yo, Ho, Ho... it's a Pirate's Life'.
title: Captain Butt's Beach
